 # Copyright 1999-2010 Gentoo Foundation

 # $Header: /var/cvsroot/gentoo-x86/app-emulation/dosemu/dosemu-1.4.1_pre20091009.ebuild,v 1.3 2010/06/24 08:59:31 angelos Exp $
 
-inherit flag-o-matic
+inherit eutils flag-o-matic
 
 P_FD="dosemu-freedos-1.0-bin"
 DESCRIPTION="DOS Emulator"
 HOMEPAGE="http://www.dosemu.org/"
 SRC_URI="mirror://sourceforge/dosemu/${P_FD}.tgz
 	mirror://gentoo/${P}.tar.bz2"
 
 LICENSE="GPL-2"
 SLOT="0"
 KEYWORDS="-* amd64 x86"
@@ -27,20 +27,22 @@
 	alsa? ( media-libs/alsa-lib )
 	sndfile? ( media-libs/libsndfile )
 	>=sys-libs/slang-1.4"
 
 DEPEND="${RDEPEND}
 	X? ( x11-proto/xf86dgaproto )
 	>=sys-devel/autoconf-2.57"
 S="${WORKDIR}/${PN}"
 
 src_compile() {
+	epatch "${FILESDIR}"/flex_yyget_leng_fix.patch
+
 	# Has problems with -O3 on some systems
 	replace-flags -O[3-9] -O2
 
 	# Fix compilation on hardened
 	append-flags -fno-pic
 
 	unset KERNEL
 
 	econf `use_with X x` \
 		`use_enable svga svgalib` \
Only in app-emulation/dosemu/files: flex_yyget_leng_fix.patch

diff -u -U10 -r /usr/portage/games-fps/quake1-data/quake1-data-2.40.ebuild games-fps/quake1-data/quake1-data-2.40.ebuild
--- /usr/portage/games-fps/quake1-data/quake1-data-2.40.ebuild	2012-01-16 11:17:40.000000000 -0800
+++ games-fps/quake1-data/quake1-data-2.40.ebuild	2012-10-17 13:52:35.294586714 -0700
@@ -38,21 +38,22 @@
 	export CDROM_NAME_SET=("Existing Install" "Quake CD (1.01)" "Ultimate Quake Collection" "Quake CD (newer)")
 	cdrom_get_cds id1:q101_int.1:Setup/ID1:resource.1
 	if [[ ${CDROM_SET} == "1" ]] ; then
 		echo ">>> Unpacking q101_int.lha to ${PWD}"
 		cat "${CDROM_ROOT}"/q101_int.1 "${CDROM_ROOT}"/q101_int.2 > \
 			"${S}"/q101_int.exe
 		lha xqf "${S}"/q101_int.exe || die "failure unpacking q101_int.exe"
 		rm -f q101_int.exe
 	elif [[ ${CDROM_SET} == "3" ]] ; then
 		echo ">>> Unpacking resource.1 to ${PWD}"
-		lha xqf "${CDROM_ROOT}"/resource.1 || die "failure unpacking resource.1"
+		cp "${CDROM_ROOT}"/resource.1 resource.x || die "failure copying resource.1"
+		lha xqf resource.x || die "failure unpacking resource.x"
 	fi
 }
 
 src_install() {
 	insinto "${GAMES_DATADIR}"/quake1/id1
 	case ${CDROM_SET} in
 		0)  doins "${CDROM_ROOT}"/id1/* || die "doins pak files"
 		    dodoc "${CDROM_ROOT}"/*.txt
 		    ;;
 		1|3)doins id1/* || die "doins pak files"

diff -u -U10 -r /usr/portage/media-gfx/xfig/xfig-3.2.5b-r2.ebuild media-gfx/xfig/xfig-3.2.5b-r2.ebuild
--- /usr/portage/media-gfx/xfig/xfig-3.2.5b-r2.ebuild	2011-11-05 23:39:07.000000000 -0700
+++ media-gfx/xfig/xfig-3.2.5b-r2.ebuild	2012-05-11 13:50:33.000000000 -0700
@@ -45,21 +45,21 @@
 		XFIGLIBDIR=/usr/share/xfig
 		XFIGDOCDIR="/usr/share/doc/${PF}"
 		MANDIR="/usr/share/man/man\$\(MANSUFFIX\)"
 		"CC=$(tc-getCC)" )
 
 	for variable in "${vars2subs[@]}" ; do
 		varname=${variable%%=*}
 		varval=${variable##*=}
 		sed -i "s:^\(XCOMM\)*[[:space:]]*${varname}[[:space:]]*=.*$:${varname} = ${varval}:" "$@"
 	done
-	sed -i "s:^\(XCOMM\)*[[:space:]]*\(#define I18N\).*$:\2:" "$@"
+#>>>	sed -i "s:^\(XCOMM\)*[[:space:]]*\(#define I18N\).*$:\2:" "$@"
 	if has_version '>=x11-libs/libXaw3d-1.5e'; then
 		einfo "x11-libs/libXaw3d 1.5e and abover installed"
 		sed -i "s:^\(XCOMM\)*[[:space:]]*\(#define XAW3D1_5E\).*$:\2:" "$@"
 	fi
 }
 
 src_prepare() {
 	# Permissions are really crazy here
 	chmod -R go+rX .
 	find . -type f -exec chmod a-x '{}' \;

@@ -9,14 +9,15 @@
 DESCRIPTION="Nice analog clock for GKrellM2"
 SRC_URI="mirror://gentoo/${P}.tar.gz"
 HOMEPAGE="http://www.gkrellm.net/"
 
 SLOT="2"
 LICENSE="GPL-2"
 KEYWORDS="alpha amd64 ppc sparc x86"
 
 src_compile() {
 	make clean #166133
+	epatch "${FILESDIR}"/xclock_size_hack.patch
 
 	export CFLAGS="${CFLAGS/-O?/}"
 	emake || die 'emake failed'
 }
